channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 05:27 Air anxiety in the Chernihiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 05:27 Air anxiety in the Chernihiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Chernihiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 01:07 pursuance of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
